package arraylist100; import java.util.ArrayList; import java.util.Collections; import java.util.Scanner; public abstract class Test { public static void main(String[] args) { Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in); System.out.println("Enter choice :"); int choice = input.nextInt(); switch(choice) { case 1: ArrayList mylist = new ArrayList (); mylist.add(5); mylist.add(3); mylist.add(6); mylist.add(8); mylist.add(9); mylist.add(2); Collections.sort(mylist); System.out.println(mylist); break; // TODO Auto-generated method stub case 2: ArrayList mylist2 = new ArrayList (); mylist2.add("Sujal"); mylist2.add("Yash"); mylist2.add("Kshitij"); mylist2.add("Sohan"); mylist2.add("Mayur"); mylist2.add("lalla"); Collections.sort(mylist2); System.out.println(mylist2); break; } }}
